paper_title: Active target TPC for study of photonuclear reactions at astrophysical energies
abstract: A setup designed to study photonuclear reactions at astrophysical energies - an active target Time Projection Chamber was developed and constructed at the Faculty of Physics, University of Warsaw. The device was successfully employed in two experiments at the Institute of Nuclear Physics Polish Academy of Sciences in Cracow, in which γ- and neutron-induced reactions with CO2 gas target were measured. The reaction products were detected and their momenta reconstructed. Preliminary results are shown.
publication_venue: Presented at Zakopane Conference on Nuclear Physics 2022
